phrs.translation: 笨手笨脚的人, 笨手笨脚, 笨蛋, 木头人
笨手笨脚的书窗口艺术工具包

sentences.sentence: If we had every klutz jump into the orchestra pit, or prance on the opera stage, or slop paint with Picasso, we would have some great parties but no art.
sentences.translation: 如果我们让每一个笨手笨脚的人都跳进乐池，或在歌剧舞台上腾跳，或与毕加索一起泼洒涂料，我们可能会造就一些不错的聚会，但绝不是艺术。

sentences.sentence: Why are you so clumsy, you klutz?
sentences.translation: 你这个笨蛋，怎么这么笨拙？

sentences.sentence: Im such as klutz. I trip on my own feet all the time!
sentences.translation: 我真是一个手脚笨拙的人。我常常把自己绊倒。
